activity.text: This PR is ready to merge. solve the issue by updating the h5py verison.

activity.title: openfoodfacts/robotoff#1558
activity.text:
Hey @alexgarel, I have updated the few changes and removed the matrix strategy form the action.

but the thing is that when python version is 3.12 then things are breaking, main issue is with HDF5 lib.

error logs :

```typescript
304 | error: Unable to load dependency HDF5, make sure HDF5 is installed properly
305 | error: libhdf5.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
